title: Super Absorbant Sponge
info: The Super Absorbant Sponge is an item that can be used to "absorb" water from the environment, causing water to disappear without storing it. It is awarded randomly by the Angler for completing fishing quests (1/70 chance after 10th quest in  Hardmode).
stat:
Type
Tool
Bonus+2 range
Use time12 (Very fast)
TooltipCapable of soaking up an endless amount of water
Rarity07*
Sell10
Research1 required
